column2: I'm signing because of the horrible horrible things amber accused Johnny of and she don't deserve anything.. kick her out of Hollywood. I never knew who she was in the first place and she is a horrible actress, no loss here
column44: Replace Amber Heard in Aquaman 1 & 2 with local celebrity Mike Reardon in his wife's dress
column51: Replace Amber Heard in Aquaman 1 & 2 with local celebrity Mike Reardon in his wife's dress
column52:
With the overwhelming support of removing Amber Heard from Aquaman 2 as seen in the petition with over 4 Million signatures, it's time to take it one step further. 

Let Warner Bros know that we won't be happy with her removal, she must be replaced in BOTH aquaman movies. But her replacement should really send a message, that we won't tolerate domestic abuse in this community.

Warner Bros. should replace her with me, Mike Reardon, a balding, bearded, fat guy in a cheap wig.

I've never acted before, but I doubt I could do a worse job than some actors. I also expect to have way better chemistry with Jason Momoa. Just look at my 30 second demo tape as Mera in Aquaman. Believe it or not, I recorded it all in my living room. 

https://youtu.be/nwxZGXu5fZc
